DOC.brief_summary: The major aim study test effectiveness bundle , multi-level intervention ( Sister Sister ) smoke cessation outcome female smoker reside public housing neighborhood . Hypothesis 1.1 : As compare control group , woman receive Sister Sister Intervention high 7-day point prevalence quit rate 6- 12-months validated salivary cotinine . Hypothesis 1.2 : As compare control group , woman receive Sister Sister Intervention high 6- 12-month prolonged smoking abstinence validate salivary cotinine .
DOC.criteria: 18 yrs age old , female , resident public housing , daily smoker pregnant , breastfeeding , intention quit smoke
